channel.title: The Cupper Documentation Builder on Cupper
channel.description: Recent content in The Cupper Documentation Builder on Cupper

item.title: Installation
item.description: Cupper is built using the static site engine, Hugo, and NPM. The codebase is available to download on Github. Let’s get everything installed step-by-step. Install Hugo First you need to install Hugo globally. OSX users If you are a Mac user and have Homebrew on your system, installing Hugo is simple: brew install hugo Alternatively, you can manually install Hugo from a package. You can verify the installation was successful by typing:
